entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
